title: Rooftop terrace, Fitness center, Wide plank hardwood-style flooring
posting_body: This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 558 Sq.
Mosso San Francisco is a vibrant apartment community in the center of dynamic SoMa.
Our Mondrian-inspired exterior opens to reveal an array of community amenities.
You may never want to leave!
Stylish interiors are finished to perfection, with swank, ultra-modern residences, just waiting for you to add your own touches.
Enjoy restaurants, shopping, nightclubs – or stay home and whip up a meal for friends before enjoying the rooftop terrace or clubroom.
Mosso’s central location is convenient, whether you stay in the city, or commute out across the Bay Area.

Washer/dryer, High-gloss cabinets, Polished quartz countertops, Townhomes and live/work spaces available, Light-filled spaces, Stainless-steel appliances, Wide plank hardwood-style flooring, Balconies*
Courtyard, Lounge areas, Rooftop terrace, Clubroom, Dog-wash station, Solarium, Fitness center, Bike fix-it center., Bike storage, Picnic area
Cats and dogs are welcome at Mosso (breed restrictions apply).
